definition: contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute

sentences.english: We need to know how hard it is to reverse the exponentiation.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要知道求冪運算的逆運算的難度。

sentences.english: The old calculation formula for fertilizer requirement did not fit to fertilizer requirement.
sentences.chinese: 原需肥量計算公式純粹是利用率不妥計算的逆運算。

sentences.english: Deconvolution is the inverse algorithm of convolution.
sentences.chinese: 卷積反演是卷積的逆運算。
